name: Hack The Mainframe
description:
HACK THE MAINFRAME

Strange memory events. High CPU usage. It can only mean one thing -- a virus. With the antivirus crippled and your OS left vulnerable, it's up to you, a humble Garbage Collector, to stop the infestation. Hack your way through each sector to save The Mainframe. If anyone gets in your way, deallocate them.

CONTROLS

Best played fullscreen with a gamepad, unless you're a masochist.
Move: Left Stick / WASD
Shoot: Right Stick / Arrow Keys
Zoom Out: Right Trigger / Space Bar
Pause: Start Button / P

MORE INFO

Howdy! I'm learning how to make games just for fun. This was heavily inspired by the hacking mini-game in NieR:Automata. Leave a comment below and tell me what's on your mind. Possibly more levels and boss fights coming, but no promies!

This was pretty fun to make and if you had fun playing it, consider throwing me some change -- think of it like dropping a few quarters into an arcade machine. All donations will go to AIDS/LifeCycle, a charity bike ride that funds HIV/AIDS medical care and outreach via the San Francisco AIDS Foundation and Los Angeles LGBT center. You can also donate directly to my ALC page here.

- LaserJock
